{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Account Manager",
  "description": "Namz Pharmacy &amp; Stores is a pharmaceutical company located in Lekki Phase 1, Lagos State, Nigeria. The company provides a wide range of pharmaceutical products and healthcare services to its customers. Namz Pharmacy &amp; Stores is dedicated to promoting health and wellness by ensuring access to quality medications and professional healthcare advice. With a focus on customer satisfaction, the company offers a variety of services, including sales of prescription drugs, over-the-counter medications, and other essential health products. The company is also committed to creating job opportunities and fostering career growth in the healthcare sector.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Job Description
Financial Record-Keeping:


	Maintain accurate daily records of sales, purchases, and expenses.
	Record all transactions in accounting software or ledgers.


Cash &amp; Bank Management:


	Reconcile daily cash collections with sales reports.
	Deposit supermarket revenue into the bank.
	Track and reconcile POS (Point of Sale) payments, bank transfers, and online payments.


Inventory &amp; Stock Accounting:


	Work with storekeepers to track inventory levels and valuation.
	Monitor stock shrinkage (loss, damage, theft).
	Assist in periodic stock-taking and ensure records tally with physical stock.


Payroll &amp; Staff Payments:


	Prepare and process staff salaries and wages.
	Deduct statutory payments (tax, pensions, etc.) and remit accordingly.


Supplier &amp; Vendor Payments:


	Record supplier invoices and monitor due dates.
	Prepare payment schedules for goods supplied.
	Reconcile statements with vendors.


Budgeting &amp; Cost Control:


	Assist management in preparing budgets.
	Track actual expenses against budget.
	Identify areas of waste or overspending.


Financial Reporting:


	Prepare daily/weekly/monthly financial reports for management.
	Provide insights on sales trends, profit margins, and operating costs.
	Assist in preparing final accounts (profit &amp; loss, balance sheet).


Compliance &amp; Internal Control:


	Ensure compliance with tax regulations and prepare tax returns (VAT, corporate tax, etc.).
	Implement internal controls to safeguard supermarket cash and assets.
	Support auditors during financial audits.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;info@namzpharmacyandstores.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-10-13",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",

      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },

  },

    }
  }
}



Account Manager Job at Namz Pharmacy & Stores




        
    

        
        Namz Pharmacy & Stores is a pharmaceutical company located in Lekki Phase 1, Lagos State, Nigeria. The company provides a wide range of pharmaceutical products and healthcare services to its customers. Namz Pharmacy & Stores is dedicated to promoting health and wellness by ensuring access to quality medications and professional healthcare advice. With a focus on customer satisfaction, the company offers a variety of services, including sales of prescription drugs, over-the-counter medications, and other essential health products. The company is also committed to creating job opportunities and fostering career growth in the healthcare sector.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Manager
     

            
    



Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Job Description
Financial Record-Keeping:


	Maintain accurate daily records of sales, purchases, and expenses.
	Record all transactions in accounting software or ledgers.


Cash & Bank Management:


	Reconcile daily cash collections with sales reports.
	Deposit supermarket revenue into the bank.
	Track and reconcile POS (Point of Sale) payments, bank transfers, and online payments.


Inventory & Stock Accounting:


	Work with storekeepers to track inventory levels and valuation.
	Monitor stock shrinkage (loss, damage, theft).
	Assist in periodic stock-taking and ensure records tally with physical stock.


Payroll & Staff Payments:


	Prepare and process staff salaries and wages.
	Deduct statutory payments (tax, pensions, etc.) and remit accordingly.


Supplier & Vendor Payments:


	Record supplier invoices and monitor due dates.
	Prepare payment schedules for goods supplied.
	Reconcile statements with vendors.


Budgeting & Cost Control:


	Assist management in preparing budgets.
	Track actual expenses against budget.
	Identify areas of waste or overspending.


Financial Reporting:


	Prepare daily/weekly/monthly financial reports for management.
	Provide insights on sales trends, profit margins, and operating costs.
	Assist in preparing final accounts (profit & loss, balance sheet).


Compliance & Internal Control:


	Ensure compliance with tax regulations and prepare tax returns (VAT, corporate tax, etc.).
	Implement internal controls to safeguard supermarket cash and assets.
	Support auditors during financial audits.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@namzpharmacyandstores.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Fullstack Developer",
  "description": "Squadio is currently recruiting suitably qualified candidates&nbsp;to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Fullstack Developer

Job Location:&nbsp;Nigeria (Remote)

Description


	We are seeking a skilled Full Stack Developer with expertise in Django and React to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will excel at designing, developing, and maintaining web applications using Django for building scalable backend systems, and React for building intuitive frontend applications.
	This role demands a combination of backend and frontend development skills, focusing on creating seamless user experiences while implementing scalable server-side solutions.


Key Responsibilities
Proficiency in Python with Django:


	Demonstrate advanced knowledge of Python and Django for server-side development.
	Write clean, well-documented code that follows best practices, focusing on code base&nbsp;consistency and maintainability.


Proficiency in React:


	Develop responsive and visually appealing user interfaces using React and associated&nbsp;libraries.
	Applies best practices regarding client-side state management and web accessibility.


Database Management:


	Manage databases using Django&rsquo;s ORM and strong SQL knowledge, with expertise in&nbsp;PostgreSQL.
	Handle schema design, querying, and optimization to ensure performance and data&nbsp;integrity.


Testing:


	Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications by writing unit and&nbsp;integration tests.
	Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize application performance across different browsers&nbsp;and devices.


Security and Performance Optimization:


	Implement Django-specific security measures and stay updated on potential vulnerabilities.
	Focus on frontend scalability and interactivity, optimizing for speed and resource efficiency.


Version Control Proficiency:


	Use Git effectively for version control, independently managing branches, merges, and pull requests as needed.


Requirements
Education and Experience:


	Bachelor&#39;s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
	Minimum of 4 years of experience in full stack development, specifically with Django and&nbsp;React.
	Prior experience in agile development methodologies is preferred.
	Portfolio showcasing previous web development projects is highly desirable.



Technical Skills:


	Proficiency in Django and Python for backend development.
	Strong knowledge of React and its ecosystem including Redux, React Router, etc.
	Experience with database management such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, or SQLite.
	Experience with React state management libraries such as Redux and Zustand.
	Understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with React UI frameworks like MUI, AntD and Radix.
	Ability to design and consume RESTful APIs.
	Familiarity with version control systems like Git and CI/CD pipelines.


Behavioral Skills:


	Proactive Learning: Continuously stay updated with industry best practices and backend&nbsp;technology advancements.
	Collaboration and Knowledge Sharing: Foster a collaborative environment by sharing insights and learning with team members.
	Effective Communication: Work closely with frontend developers, project managers, and&nbsp;other team members to ensure seamless project progress and alignment on requirements.
	Problem-solving: Exhibit strong problem-solving skills to tackle technical challenges with&nbsp;innovative solutions.
",
  "datePosted": "2025-09-24",
  "validThrough": "2025-10-25",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Squadio"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Abuja, Enugu, Lagos, Rivers (PH)",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },

    "@type": "PropertyValue",

    "value": "187858"
  },

    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",

    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 0,
      "maxValue": 0,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Fullstack Developer Job at Squadio




        
    

        
        Squadio is currently recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Fullstack Developer

Job Location: Nigeria (Remote)

Description
     

            
    




	We are seeking a skilled Full Stack Developer with expertise in Django and React to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will excel at designing, developing, and maintaining web applications using Django for building scalable backend systems, and React for building intuitive frontend applications.
	This role demands a combination of backend and frontend development skills, focusing on creating seamless user experiences while implementing scalable server-side solutions.


Key Responsibilities
Proficiency in Python with Django:


	Demonstrate advanced knowledge of Python and Django for server-side development.
	Write clean, well-documented code that follows best practices, focusing on code base consistency and maintainability.


Proficiency in React:


	Develop responsive and visually appealing user interfaces using React and associated libraries.
	Applies best practices regarding client-side state management and web accessibility.


Database Management:


	Manage databases using Django’s ORM and strong SQL knowledge, with expertise in PostgreSQL.
	Handle schema design, querying, and optimization to ensure performance and data integrity.


Testing:


	Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications by writing unit and integration tests.
	Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize application performance across different browsers and devices.


Security and Performance Optimization:


	Implement Django-specific security measures and stay updated on potential vulnerabilities.
	Focus on frontend scalability and interactivity, optimizing for speed and resource efficiency.


Version Control Proficiency:


	Use Git effectively for version control, independently managing branches, merges, and pull requests as needed.


Requirements
Education and Experience:


	Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
	Minimum of 4 years of experience in full stack development, specifically with Django and React.
	Prior experience in agile development methodologies is preferred.
	Portfolio showcasing previous web development projects is highly desirable.



Technical Skills:


	Proficiency in Django and Python for backend development.
	Strong knowledge of React and its ecosystem including Redux, React Router, etc.
	Experience with database management such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, or SQLite.
	Experience with React state management libraries such as Redux and Zustand.
	Understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with React UI frameworks like MUI, AntD and Radix.
	Ability to design and consume RESTful APIs.
	Familiarity with version control systems like Git and CI/CD pipelines.


Behavioral Skills:


	Proactive Learning: Continuously stay updated with industry best practices and backend technology advancements.
	Collaboration and Knowledge Sharing: Foster a collaborative environment by sharing insights and learning with team members.
	Effective Communication: Work closely with frontend developers, project managers, and other team members to ensure seamless project progress and alignment on requirements.
	Problem-solving: Exhibit strong problem-solving skills to tackle technical challenges with innovative solutions.
    

    

        Click here to Apply

Head, Branch Operations Job at Optimus Bank




        
    

        
        Optimus Bank is a digital-driven financial service platform built with a bold ambition of offering optimum banking experiences to millions of customers globally.

We are recruiting to fill the position of:

Job Position: Head, Branch Operations

Job Location: Kaduna
Job Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities 
     

            
    




	Ensure effective administration of the cash management and vault access control
	Liaise with all internal and external auditors to ensure there are no exceptions or penalties/fines.
	Regular review of reports and internal ledgers.
	Ensure all possible failure points/lapses in branch operations are identified and resolved.
	Create a positive, supportive, and collaborative work environment for efficient internal customer service delivery.
	Ensure Prompt rendition of all required regulatory and internal reports.
	Business Office Staff supervision and coordination
	Availing Branch-wide Transaction Approval
	Customer Service Bench marking Standards Maintenance
	Customer Complaints Management
	Ensure adequate training for all staff
	Coordination of Bank-wide Cash Management Unit
	Proofs Preparation and Transactions Reconciliation
	Regulatory compliance and monitoring
	Builds Customers' Interest in the Bank’s Products and Services
	Drive digital adoption in line with the Bank’s strategy


Requirements


	A Bachelor's Degree in Finance, Business Administration, Economics, or any related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of banking experience in Branch Operations.


Benefits


	Limitless Growth.
	Positive and Inclusive Work Environment.
	Tailored Rewards and Recognitions.
	Continuous learning environment.
	Health and Wellness Benefits.
    

    

        Click here to Apply
